value:
$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Go, Gullinbursti! Trample them under
your iron hooves. Return the people
to the ground they so cherish!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|No mercy! Spare no one! My brother
demands all tremble before him and
perish! Ah-hahahaha!$k$p

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|What is he doing here? Why attack
out of nowhere like this?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Veronica!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Brother?! You've...come back?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|I've brought you reinforcements.
Alfonse and his companions.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh... Just them?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wow! And after we've come to help
you and everything!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What is the situation on the field,
Princess Veronica?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|See for yourself... It's not looking
good... He has strange soldiers at his
command, and we can't compete.$k$pAnd as for Fáfnir himself...he must
be some kind of monster.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It seems he has regained his
strength then...$k$pFor now, all we can do is try to force
their withdrawal from Embla!$k$p$Sbs1000|
